body.p:
Louisville May 24th 65 --
Govenor Bramlette
Dear Sir

Enclosed you will find the verdict of the Jury in the case of Peter Belner Sr. He is quite an old man, & very feeble. The Jury would not have found him Guilty but for making the request for pardon in their verdict they believed that you would pardon him
P. S. Direct pardon to Wm R. Thomas, Jailer.
